description: This file defines a custom embedder class for Huggingface models, including methods for obtaining embeddings and handling the Huggingface InferenceClient.

classes.name: HuggingfaceCustomEmbedder
classes.description: A custom embedder class that interfaces with Huggingface's inference API to generate text embeddings.

methods.name: client
methods.description: Property that initializes and returns the Huggingface InferenceClient instance.

methods.name: _response
methods.description: Internal method to get feature extraction response from the model.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Method to obtain a list of floats representing the embedding of the input text.

methods.name: get_embedding_and_usage
methods.description: Method to get the embedding along with usage information (currently returns None for usage).
